trait.name: Adamantine Armouring
entries:
The warforged charger's weapon attacks are adamantine.
Also, critical hits against it don't double the damage dice, although they may trigger other effects.

trait.name: Powerful Charge
entries: If the warforged charge moves at least 15 feet straight towards a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warforged charger makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
